entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
